mapper.select: select count(*) from meeting join (select meeting_no as a from meeting_participants where status = 1 and user_no = #{param1}) a on meeting.meeting_no = a.a where meeting.is_progress = 0

select photo.photo_filename as meeting_filename, meeting.meeting_title as meeting_title, exercise.exercise_name as exercise_name, meeting.meeting_min as min, meeting.meeting_max as max, location1.location1_name as location1, location2.location2_name as location2, meeting.meeting_date as meeting_date, users.profile_photo as profile_filename, users.user_nickname as nickname, meeting.meeting_no as meeting_no from (select * from (select rownum as rn, b.* from (select * from meeting join (select meeting_no as a from meeting_participants where status = 1 and user_no = #{param1}) a on meeting.meeting_no = a.a where meeting.is_progress = 0 order by meeting.meeting_date) b) c where c.rn between #{param2} and #{param3}) meeting join users on meeting.user_no = users.user_no join location1 on meeting.location1_no = location1.location1_no join location2 on meeting.location2_no = location2.location2_no join exercise on meeting.exercise_no = exercise.exercise_no left join photo on meeting.meeting_no = photo.photo_referer_no and photo_referer_sep = 4 order by meeting_date
select LISTAGG(exercise_no, ',') within group (order by exercise_no) as interest_list from user_interest where user_no = #{param1}
